text: fay shay' yamnaeuhum min al'iiman biallah walyawm alakhir baed ma wuddiht lahum alayata? wama lahum 'iidha quri ealayhim alquran la yasjudun lilaha, wala ysllimun bima ja' fiha? 'iinama sijiyat aladhin kafaruu altakdhib wamukhalifat alhuq. wallah 'aelam bima yaktumun fi sudurihim min aleinad mae eilmuhum bi'ana ma ja' bih alquran hiqan, fabashirhum -aiyaha alrasula- bi'ana allaha- eazun wajalan- qad aedd lahum edhabana mwjeana, lkn aladhin amanuu biallah warasulih waddawa ma faradah allah ealayhima, lahum 'ajr fi alakhirat ghyr maqtue wala manqusa
